it.unipr.ce.dsg.deus.impl.resource
Class AllocableResource

java.lang.Object
  it.unipr.ce.dsg.deus.core.Resource
      it.unipr.ce.dsg.deus.impl.resource.AllocableResource

public class AllocableResource
extends Resource

This class represents a generic allocable resource. This kind of resource has a type (string) and amount (double) parameter that should be specified into the simulation configuration file.

Author:
Matteo Agosti (agosti@ce.unipr.it), Michele Amoretti (michele.amoretti@unipr.it)
